entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of flurries late this evening and after midnight with risk of freezing rain. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few rain showers beginning late in the evening then changing to flurries overnight. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 late in the evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 20 January 2023
